    • doesRemoteRepositoryExists

      public boolean doesRemoteRepositoryExists()
      Checks if a remote repository exists and is accessible.
      Returns:
      true if the remote repository exists and is accessible, false otherwise.

    • getRepositoryInfos

      public JSONData.JSONRepository getRepositoryInfos() throws URISyntaxException, org.eclipse.jgit.api.errors.GitAPIException
      Gets the remote repository information.
      Returns:
      The remote repository information.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If an error occurred while getting the remote repository information.
      org.eclipse.jgit.api.errors.GitAPIException - If an error occurred while getting the remote repository information.
